fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Abduct the whole ass town into your lab for a day (night ability).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The following day after abducting the Town, before any messages are processed, they will be sent to you. You may edit these messages to your pleasing before posting them to the town. You may similarly decide votes and whispers.
- You will be removed from the town during this day, and while you may still interact otherwise, you may not be lynched nor vote/message.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Gaslight a shit ton of people and/or conduct a social experiment (Host defines whether you succeed in this)
